name: inControl (muniruboss)
description:
you wake up in an unknown place only to discover you don't have complete control over your movements anymore but your not  alone you are in a place filled with dangerous creatures with what seems to have size issues but you are in the aid of a malfunctioning gun but it seems like the only thing that has the most control do you think you have what it takes to survive ?

p.s nearly everything is out of control keep that in mind

LEFT and RIGHT arrow keys to move.

click to place gun (clicks are limited)

Give good ratings..

and ENJOY
